review.author: DevOps (Codex)
review.findings: Hotfix: processQueue exponential defer backoff (100ms→2s cap) on all 4 defer paths (compaction, injection-in-flight, user-input-focused, typing-guard). Log throttling — first defer logged, repeats suppressed, summary on state change. Defer state reset when queue resumes/empties. 3 new tests (backoff progression, reset after resume, log suppression). Fixes renderer freeze from console flood during sustained deferral. 108 suites / 3290 tests.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
